docs.text: Information model for the NBNL-capaciteitskaart. The capacity heatmaps information model was defined to cover a superset of data exchanged by the NL distribution system operators. A minimum set of data is defined that all operators are expected to conform to, along with a number of optional properties and data types. The data is intended to be presented as a hierarchy with a HeatmapDataSet at its root, then Substations and Circuits nested inside the HeatmapDataSet . Substations and Ciruits then have their own child elements forming a tree of data with the HeatmapDataSet at the root. This information model is based in part on the LTDS Capacity Heatmap Information Model , which itself is published under the Open Government License , under ©Crown copyright 2024. docs.text: Class: Circuit A circuit representing a connection between substations. This could be an HV circuit between stations or a circuit feeding multiple secondary stations from a primary. This data element is provided to support utilities that wish to share specfic or all circuits. It may be non unique and may not correlate to a naming hierarchy. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart slot_uri : cim:IdentifiedObject.description domain_of : - HeatmapDataSet - Constraint - Curtailment - IdentifiedObject - NameType - NameTypeAuthority range : string m_rid : name : m_rid description : Master resource identifier issued by a model authority. The mRID is unique within an exchange context. Global uniqueness is easily achieved by using a UUID, as specified in RFC 4122, for the mRID. The use of UUID is strongly recommended. For CIMXML data files in RDF syntax conforming to IEC 61970-552, the mRID is mapped to rdf:ID or rdf:about attributes that identify CIM object elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : cim:IdentifiedObject.mRID domain_of : - IdentifiedObject range : string names : name : names description : All names of this identified object. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : cim:IdentifiedObject.Names multivalued : true domain_of : - IdentifiedObject range : Name class_uri : cim:IdentifiedObject

docs.text: Class: NameType Type of name. Possible values for attribute 'name' are implementation dependent but standard profiles may specify types. An enterprise may have multiple IT systems each having its own local name for the same object, e.g. a planning system may have different names from an EMS. An object may also have different names within the same IT system, e.g. localName as defined in CIM version 14. The definition from CIM14 is The localName is a human readable name of the object. It is a free text name local to a node in a naming hierarchy similar to a file directory structure. A power system related naming hierarchy may be Substation, VoltageLevel, Equipment etc. Children of the same parent in such a hierarchy have names that typically are unique among them. docs.text: Class: PowerSystemResource A power system resource (PSR) can be an item of equipment such as a switch, an equipment container containing many individual items of equipment such as a substation, or an organisational entity such as sub-control area. Power system resources can have measurements associated. URI: cim:PowerSystemResource classDiagram class PowerSystemResource click PowerSystemResource href "../PowerSystemResource" IdentifiedObject <|-- PowerSystemResource click IdentifiedObject href "../IdentifiedObject" PowerSystemResource <|-- Equipment click Equipment href "../Equipment" PowerSystemResource <|-- ConnectivityNodeContainer click ConnectivityNodeContainer href "../ConnectivityNodeContainer" PowerSystemResource : description PowerSystemResource : m_rid PowerSystemResource : names PowerSystemResource --> "*" Name : names click Name href "../Name" Inheritance IdentifiedObject PowerSystemResource Equipment ConnectivityNodeContainer Slots Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance description 0..1 String The description is a free human readable text describing or naming the object IdentifiedObject m_rid 0..1 String Master resource identifier issued by a model authority IdentifiedObject names * Name All names of this identified object IdentifiedObject Identifier and Mapping Information Schema Source from schema: https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart Mappings Mapping Type Mapped Value self cim:PowerSystemResource native nbnl:PowerSystemResource LinkML Source Direct name : PowerSystemResource description : A power system resource (PSR) can be an item of equipment such as a switch, an equipment container containing many individual items of equipment such as a substation, or an organisational entity such as sub-control area. It may be non unique and may not correlate to a naming hierarchy. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart slot_uri : cim:IdentifiedObject.description alias : description owner : PowerSystemResource domain_of : - HeatmapDataSet - Constraint - Curtailment - IdentifiedObject - NameType - NameTypeAuthority range : string m_rid : name : m_rid description : Master resource identifier issued by a model authority. The mRID is unique within an exchange context. Global uniqueness is easily achieved by using a UUID, as specified in RFC 4122, for the mRID. The use of UUID is strongly recommended. docs.text: Class: Rating A rating assigned to a transformer. This allows multiple ratings to be defined for a single transformer. Different ratings for different voltages (e.g. 20->50 is different from 50->20 for reverse powerflow). Any constraints that impact this capacity should be listed as individual constraints linked to the substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandFirmCapacity domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true demand_contracted_capacity : name : demand_contracted_capacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently contracted at the substation which is not yet connected (i.e. do not include any demand that is included in demandConnectedCapacity). This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandContractedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandContractedCapacity values in the Demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandContractedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demand_connected_capacity : name : demand_connected_capacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently connected at the substation. This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandConnectedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandConnectedCapacity values in the demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandConnectedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demand_quoted_capacity : name : demand_quoted_capacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently quoted at the substation excluding contracted and connected (i.e. does not include demandConnectedCapacity or demandContractedCapacity). This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandQuotedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandQuotedCapacity values in the demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandQuotedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demand_available_capacity : name : demand_available_capacity description : The available demand capacity (in MVA) at the substation. This value is calculated based on total firm capacity, maximum demand, connected capacity, quoted capacity, contracted capacity, and any other constraints on the network. The value should reflect the capacity a network operator would make available to a connecting party, which may be calculated for the most onerous season, or a value based on more detailed analysis and internal policies. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandAvailableCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A required : true demand_maximum : name : demand_maximum description : The maximum demand (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand without removing the impact of any generation on observed demand at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 33kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 33kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. Users wishing to see separate summer/winter peaks can obtain this from the data. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandMaximum domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand_minimum : name : demand_minimum description : The minimum demand (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 33kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 33kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. Users wishing to see separate summer/winter peaks can obtain this from the data. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandMinimum domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand__percentile : name : demand__percentile description : The 25th percentile of demanding (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 50kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 50kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demand25Percentile domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand_constraint : name : demand_constraint description : A RAG definition of the demand constraints at the substation. The value for generationContractedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the generationContractedCapacity values in the Generator and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationContractedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Generator - Storage range : MegaV-A generation_quoted_capacity : name : generation_quoted_capacity description : Sum of all currently quoted generation (in MVA) at the substation excluding any that are already contracted or connected. The value for generationQuotedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the generationQuotedCapacity values in the Generator and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationQuotedCapacity alias : generation_quoted_capacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Generator - Storage range : MegaV-A generation_available_capacity : name : generation_available_capacity description : Available generation capacity (in MVA) at the substation. This value is calculated based on total firm generation, capacity, demand, connected capacity, contracted capacity, and any other constraints on the network. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationAvailableCapacity alias : generation_available_capacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true generation_constraint : name : generation_constraint description : A RAG definition of the demand constraints at the substation. It is expressed in KA RMS at contact separation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerBreakingCapacity alias : breaker_breaking_capacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : KiloA breaker_making_capacity : name : breaker_making_capacity description : The making current (in kA) of the circuit breaker, when closed on a short circuit, is the peak value of the maximum current wave (including dc component) in the first cycle of the current after the circuit is closed by the circuit breaker. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerMakingCapacity alias : breaker_making_capacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : KiloA breaker_available_capacity : name : breaker_available_capacity description : The available capacity (in kA) of the circuit breaker. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerAvailableCapacity alias : breaker_available_capacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : KiloA breaker_short_circuit_current : name : breaker_short_circuit_current description : The short circuit current (in kA) of a circuit breaker is the RMS value of current that a breaker can carry in a fully closed condition without damage, for the specified time interval under prescribed condition. These ratings are based on thermal limitation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerShortCircuitCurrent alias : breaker_short_circuit_current owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : KiloA breaker_short_circuit_duration : name : breaker_short_circuit_duration description : Specified time interval (in seconds) the Short Circuit Current can be carried for without damage. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerShortCircuitDuration alias : breaker_short_circuit_duration owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : integer reverse_power_flow_total_capacity : name : reverse_power_flow_total_capacity description : The reverse capacity (in MVA) for the substation from lower to higher voltage levels. 0 if there are no reverse powerflow capabilities. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.reversePowerFlowTotalCapacity alias : reverse_power_flow_total_capacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true reverse_power_flow_available_capacity : name : reverse_power_flow_available_capacity description : The available reverse capacity (in MVA) for the substation from lower to higher voltage levels. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.reversePowerFlowAvailableCapacity alias : reverse_power_flow_available_capacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true embedded_capacity_register : name : embedded_capacity_register description : TODO A URL to the embedded capacity register entry for this station. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.embeddedCapacityRegister alias : embedded_capacity_register owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : string demands : name : demands description : The demands at the station covering connected, contracted and quoted. This data is optional and may aggregated into the substation attributes, but utilities may optionally provide details on individual demands. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Demands multivalued : true alias : demands owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : Demand generators : name : generators description : The generators at the station covering connected, contracted and quoted. This data is optional and may aggregated into the substation attributes, but utilities may optionally provide details on individual generators. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Generators multivalued : true alias : generators owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : Generator storage : name : storage description : The storage devices at the station covering connected, contracted and quoted. This data is optional and may aggregated into the substation attributes, but utilities may optionally provide details on individual storage devices. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Storage multivalued : true alias : storage owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : Storage other_constraints : name : other_constraints description : An additional constraint on the Substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.OtherConstraints multivalued : true alias : other_constraints owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : Constraint transformers : name : transformers description : The transformers connected at the substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Transformers multivalued : true alias : transformers owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : PowerTransformer curtailments : name : curtailments description : Curtailments at the Substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Curtailments multivalued : true alias : curtailments owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : Curtailment description : name : description description : The description is a free human readable text describing or naming the object. It may be non unique and may not correlate to a naming hierarchy. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart slot_uri : cim:IdentifiedObject.description alias : description owner : Substation domain_of : - HeatmapDataSet - Constraint - Curtailment - IdentifiedObject - NameType - NameTypeAuthority range : string m_rid : name : m_rid description : Master resource identifier issued by a model authority. The mRID is unique within an exchange context. Global uniqueness is easily achieved by using a UUID, as specified in RFC 4122, for the mRID. The use of UUID is strongly recommended. For CIMXML data files in RDF syntax conforming to IEC 61970-552, the mRID is mapped to rdf:ID or rdf:about attributes that identify CIM object elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : cim:IdentifiedObject.mRID alias : m_rid owner : Substation domain_of : - IdentifiedObject range : string names : name : names description : All names of this identified object. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : cim:IdentifiedObject.Names multivalued : true alias : names owner : Substation domain_of : - IdentifiedObject range : Name class_uri : cim:Substation

docs.text: name : Substation description : A Substation with connect demand, generation or storage. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 is_a : EquipmentContainer attributes : type : name : type description : The type of the substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.type domain_of : - Substation - Constraint - Curtailment - Geometry range : SubstationKind required : true area : name : area description : The name of the license area. This should be the abbreviation used in the license (e.g. STEDIN for Stedin) from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.area domain_of : - Substation required : true short_code : name : short_code description : Short code name for substation (alphanumeric, uppercase letters only). from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.shortCode domain_of : - Substation voltages : name : voltages description : The voltages at the Substation in Kilovolts (kV). from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.voltages multivalued : true domain_of : - Substation - PowerTransformer range : integer required : true coordinate : name : coordinate description : The longitude/latitude value of the substation as a single latitude/longitude point. For a GeoJSON Heatmap format this data will be part of the feature itself allowing for more complex geometry. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Coordinate domain_of : - Substation range : Coordinate required : true demand_firm_capacity : name : demand_firm_capacity description : The firm capacity (in MVA) for demand at the substation. Any constraints that impact this capacity should be listed as individual constraints linked to the substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandFirmCapacity domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true demand_contracted_capacity : name : demand_contracted_capacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently contracted at the substation which is not yet connected (i.e. do not include any demand that is included in demandConnectedCapacity). This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandContractedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandContractedCapacity values in the Demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandContractedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demand_connected_capacity : name : demand_connected_capacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently connected at the substation. This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandConnectedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandConnectedCapacity values in the demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandConnectedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demand_quoted_capacity : name : demand_quoted_capacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently quoted at the substation excluding contracted and connected (i.e. does not include demandConnectedCapacity or demandContractedCapacity). This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandQuotedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandQuotedCapacity values in the demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandQuotedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demand_available_capacity : name : demand_available_capacity description : The available demand capacity (in MVA) at the substation. This value is calculated based on total firm capacity, maximum demand, connected capacity, quoted capacity, contracted capacity, and any other constraints on the network. The value should reflect the capacity a network operator would make available to a connecting party, which may be calculated for the most onerous season, or a value based on more detailed analysis and internal policies. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandAvailableCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A required : true demand_maximum : name : demand_maximum description : The maximum demand (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand without removing the impact of any generation on observed demand at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 33kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 33kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. Users wishing to see separate summer/winter peaks can obtain this from the data. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandMaximum domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand_minimum : name : demand_minimum description : The minimum demand (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 33kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 33kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. Users wishing to see separate summer/winter peaks can obtain this from the data. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandMinimum domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand__percentile : name : demand__percentile description : The 25th percentile of demanding (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 50kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 50kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demand25Percentile domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand_constraint : name : demand_constraint description : A RAG definition of the demand constraints at the substation. A utility should provide details on how this RAG status is calculated as part of the accompanying documentation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandConstraint domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : RAGKind required : true demand_constraint_limiting_factor : name : demand_constraint_limiting_factor description : The limiting factor for demand constraints, either thermal, voltage or fault level for the demandConstraint value. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandConstraintLimitingFactor domain_of : - Substation range : LimitingFactorKind required : true generation_firm_capacity : name : generation_firm_capacity description : The total firm generation capacity (in MVA) of the substation. docs.text: name : Substation description : A Substation with connect demand, generation or storage. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 is_a : EquipmentContainer attributes : type : name : type description : The type of the substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.type alias : type owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Constraint - Curtailment - Geometry range : SubstationKind required : true area : name : area description : The name of the license area. This should be the abbreviation used in the license (e.g. STEDIN for Stedin) from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.area alias : area owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : string required : true short_code : name : short_code description : Short code name for substation (alphanumeric, uppercase letters only). from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.shortCode alias : short_code owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : string voltages : name : voltages description : The voltages at the Substation in Kilovolts (kV). from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.voltages multivalued : true alias : voltages owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - PowerTransformer range : integer required : true coordinate : name : coordinate description : The longitude/latitude value of the substation as a single latitude/longitude point. For a GeoJSON Heatmap format this data will be part of the feature itself allowing for more complex geometry. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Coordinate alias : coordinate owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : Coordinate required : true demand_firm_capacity : name : demand_firm_capacity description : The firm capacity (in MVA) for demand at the substation. Any constraints that impact this capacity should be listed as individual constraints linked to the substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandFirmCapacity alias : demand_firm_capacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true demand_contracted_capacity : name : demand_contracted_capacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently contracted at the substation which is not yet connected (i.e. do not include any demand that is included in demandConnectedCapacity). This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandContractedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandContractedCapacity values in the Demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandContractedCapacity alias : demand_contracted_capacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demand_connected_capacity : name : demand_connected_capacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently connected at the substation. This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandConnectedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandConnectedCapacity values in the demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandConnectedCapacity alias : demand_connected_capacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demand_quoted_capacity : name : demand_quoted_capacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently quoted at the substation excluding contracted and connected (i.e. does not include demandConnectedCapacity or demandContractedCapacity). This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandQuotedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandQuotedCapacity values in the demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandQuotedCapacity alias : demand_quoted_capacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demand_available_capacity : name : demand_available_capacity description : The available demand capacity (in MVA) at the substation. This value is calculated based on total firm capacity, maximum demand, connected capacity, quoted capacity, contracted capacity, and any other constraints on the network. The value should reflect the capacity a network operator would make available to a connecting party, which may be calculated for the most onerous season, or a value based on more detailed analysis and internal policies. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandAvailableCapacity alias : demand_available_capacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A required : true demand_maximum : name : demand_maximum description : The maximum demand (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand without removing the impact of any generation on observed demand at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 33kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 33kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. Users wishing to see separate summer/winter peaks can obtain this from the data. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandMaximum alias : demand_maximum owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand_minimum : name : demand_minimum description : The minimum demand (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 33kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 33kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. Users wishing to see separate summer/winter peaks can obtain this from the data. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandMinimum alias : demand_minimum owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand__percentile : name : demand__percentile description : The 25th percentile of demanding (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 50kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 50kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demand25Percentile alias : demand__percentile owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand_constraint : name : demand_constraint description : A RAG definition of the demand constraints at the substation. A utility should provide details on how this RAG status is calculated as part of the accompanying documentation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandConstraint alias : demand_constraint owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : RAGKind required : true demand_constraint_limiting_factor : name : demand_constraint_limiting_factor description : The limiting factor for demand constraints, either thermal, voltage or fault level for the demandConstraint value. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandConstraintLimitingFactor alias : demand_constraint_limiting_factor owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : LimitingFactorKind required : true generation_firm_capacity : name : generation_firm_capacity description : The total firm generation capacity (in MVA) of the substation. Any constraints that impact this capacity should be listed as individual constraints linked to the substation. The approach used to calculate this value should be defined in accompanying documentation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationFirmCapacity alias : generation_firm_capacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true generation_connected_capacity : name : generation_connected_capacity description : Sum of all generation (in MVA) currently connected at the substation. This includes individual generation and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect generation and storage. The value for generationContractedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the generationContractedCapacity values in the Generator and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationContractedCapacity alias : generation_contracted_capacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Generator - Storage range : MegaV-A generation_quoted_capacity : name : generation_quoted_capacity description : Sum of all currently quoted generation (in MVA) at the substation excluding any that are already contracted or connected. The value for generationQuotedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the generationQuotedCapacity values in the Generator and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationQuotedCapacity alias : generation_quoted_capacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Generator - Storage range : MegaV-A generation_available_capacity : name : generation_available_capacity description : Available generation capacity (in MVA) at the substation. docs.text: Slot: breaker_short_circuit_current The short circuit current (in kA) of a circuit breaker is the RMS value of current that a breaker can carry in a fully closed condition without damage, for the specified time interval under prescribed condition. docs.text: im-capaciteitskaart The capacity heatmaps information model was defined to cover a superset of data exchanged by the NL distribution system operators. A minimum set of data is defined that all operators are expected to conform to, along with a number of optional properties and data types. The data is intended to be presented as a hierarchy with a HeatmapDataSet at its root, then Substations and Circuits nested inside the HeatmapDataSet . Substations and Ciruits then have their own child elements forming a tree of data with the HeatmapDataSet at the root. This information model is based in part on the LTDS Capacity Heatmap Information Model , which itself is published under the Open Government License , under ©Crown copyright 2024. URI: https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart
docs.title: im-capaciteitskaart

docs.text: Slot: m_rid Master resource identifier issued by a model authority. The mRID is unique within an exchange context. Global uniqueness is easily achieved by using a UUID, as specified in RFC 4122, for the mRID. The use of UUID is strongly recommended. For CIMXML data files in RDF syntax conforming to IEC 61970-552, the mRID is mapped to rdf:ID or rdf:about attributes that identify CIM object elements.
